segments.text: I was looking at my test score and think that it should be higher .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is the math wrong or the way the answer was marked ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think an answer got marked wrong that should have been marked right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: These things can happen ; let's double-check the answers first to be sure , all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look at the answer sheet and compare it to your answers . Do you see any place where I made a mistake in grading ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one right here should be right .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I see the same thing ; now we can do the math and check that , right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I count all of the correct answers , total them , and divide by the total . Does this look right to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for caring enough to check on your scores ; keep studying !
segments.speaker: S2
